snippet: In the Republican race, Christopher Shays, a former congressman, appears to be far behind Linda E. McMahon, who has lent her campaign $12.5 million.
abstract: Former Congressman Christopher Shays appears to be far behind Linda E McMahon in the Republican Senate primary in Connecticut; McMahon has spent roughly $65 million on two races since 2010 and blanketed the state with advertisements while Shays has barely been able to get his name out; Quinnipiac University poll shows a 59 percent to 30 percent advantage for McMahon.
lead_paragraph: In the Republican race, Christopher Shays, a former congressman, appears to be far behind Linda E. McMahon, who has lent her campaign $12.5 million.

headline.seo: McMahon and Shays Facing Off in Connecticut Senate Primary
headline.main: Senate Primary in Connecticut Sets Experience Against Money
headline.print_headline: Senate Primary In Connecticut Sets Experience Against Money
